i need to integrate over my data, which is denoted as {q, I},here I is the Intensity i need to obtain the form of the following integration( its not a numeric integration, because it contain x, next we need to plot over x rangesï¼‰                gamma[x_]:=Integrate[i*q^2*Cos[q*x],{q,0,Infinity}]/Integrate[i*q^2,{q,0,Infinity}]      and here problems come, the data i posted next is just from q ranges 0.1-1.8, how can i Integrate from o to Infinity, i need to extrapolation. function I1 is the extrapolation function of q ranges 0-0.1                I1 = 11922 Exp[-217.2136 q^2];      function I3 is the extrapolation function of q ranges 1.8-Infinity                I3 = 23.6631/q^4      and I2 is from the data set in the following i hope i expressed it clear               data={{0.06781,
